name: Turkey Divan Skillet Dinner

instructions.en: Brown meat with onion, celery, and mushrooms until celery is tender. Drain grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte mäso s cibuľou, zelerom a hubami, kým zeler nezmäkne. Zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: 肉を玉ねぎ、セロリ、マッシュルームと一緒にセロリが柔らかくなるまで炒めます。脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in salt, pepper, and curry powder. Sprinkle xanthan gum over and quickly stir in.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte soľ, korenie a karí prášok. Posypte xantánovou gumou a rýchlo zamiešajte.
instructions.ja: 塩、コショウ、カレー粉を加えて混ぜます。キサンタンガムをふりかけ、素早く混ぜ込みます。

instructions.en: Add broth and cream; bring to simmer. Cook and stir until sauce thickens.
instructions.sk: Pridajte vývar a smotanu; priveďte do varu. Varte a miešajte, kým omáčka nezhustne.
instructions.ja: ブロスとクリームを加えて沸騰させます。ソースが濃くなるまで調理し、かき混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add broccoli and heat through. Adjust seasonings, add cheese and stir to melt.
instructions.sk: Pridajte brokolicu a prehrejte. Upravte korenie, pridajte syr a miešajte, kým sa neroztopí.
instructions.ja: ブロッコリーを加えて温めます。味を調整し、チーズを加えて溶けるまで混ぜます。

notes: Makes 4-6 servings. Can be frozen. For broccoli, use Mann's Broccoli Wokly and microwave for 1-2 minutes only. Remove from bag immediately after cooking to prevent overcooking.
